Quote: Buildings burn, people die, but real love is forever.
Author: Sarah Mohr

Quote: It can’t rain all the time.
Author: Eric Draven

Quote: “Mother” is the name for God on the lips and hearts of all children.
Author: Eric Draven

Quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.
Author: Nelson Mandela

Quote: What is better? To be born good or to overcome your evil nature through great effort?
Author: Paarthurnax

Quote: Be the change you wish to see in the world.
Author: Gandhi

Quote: Never look a tulip in the eye.
Author: Lulu

Quote: You wear a mask for so long, you forget who you were beneath it.
Author: Alan Moore

Quote: It’s not how much time you have, it’s how you use it.
Author: Ekko

Quote: The rains have ceased and we have been graced with another beautiful day… but you are not here to see it.
Author: Elidibus

Quote: All points of view are useful, even those that are wrong—if we can judge why a wrong view was accepted.
Author: Legion

Quote: The heart is the strongest muscle.
Author: Braum

Quote: We are what we overcome.
Author: Pantheon

Quote: I have become what I must be.
Author: Yorick

Quote: To shine like a sun, first you must burn like one.
Author: Leona

Quote: Courage is unpredictable—it’s total insanity that you can rely on.
Author: Kled

Quote: The soul becomes dyed with the color of its thoughts.
Author: Marcus Aurelius

Quote: Never love anyone who treats you like you’re ordinary.
Author: Oscar Wilde

Quote: Love is a fire. But whether it’s going to warm your hearth or burn down your house, you can never tell.
Author: Joan Crawford

Quote: I have been bent and broken but—I hope—into better shape.
Author: Charles Dickens

Quote: And so we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past.
Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

Quote: She had not known the weight until she felt the freedom.
Author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

Quote: You’re mad, bonkers, off your head. But I’ll tell you a secret: All the best people are.
Author: Alice

Quote: Never interrupt your enemy when he is making a mistake.
Author: Napoleon Bonaparte

Quote: Appear weak when you are strong, and strong when you are weak.
Author: Sun Tzu

Quote: Be polite. Be professional. But have a plan to kill everybody you meet.
Author: General Jim Mattis

Quote: The universe is a cruel and vexing puzzle. I’m at the whim of the cosmos.
Author: Charles Boyle

Quote: To live is to suffer. And in suffering, find strength, purpose, and hope.
Author: Venat

Quote: In the end, all we can do is press on. For those we have lost. For those we can yet save.
Author: Thancred

Quote: We must all face the choice between what is right and what is easy.
Author: Albus Dumbledore
Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

Quote: Never forget what you are. The world will not. Wear it like armor, and it can never be used to hurt you.
Author: Tyrion Lannister

Quote: I will hate the man you choose because he is not me, and love him if he makes you smile.
Author: Lann Mandragoran

Quote: I was never really insane except upon occasions when my heart was touched.
Author: Edgar Allan Poe

Quote: A wizard is never late, nor is he early; he arrives precisely when he means to.
Author: Gandalf

Quote: It’s the job that’s never started as takes longest to finish.
Author: Samwise Gamgee

Quote: Faithless is he who says farewell when the road darkens.
Author: Gimli

Quote: I do not love the bright sword for its sharpness, nor the arrow for its swiftness, nor the warrior for his glory. I love only that which they defend.
Author: Faramir
